
+---------------------+     qualifier     +---------------------+
|    model element    +------------------>|      annotation     |
+----------+----------+                   +---------------------+
           |                                         |
           | represents                              | represents
           v                                         v
+---------------------+    relationship   +---------------------+
|  modelling object A +------------------>|  modelling object B |
+---------------------+                   +---------------------+
